"...then you're all mine, sweetie pie!" Melanie giggles girlishly and lifts up her top, revealing a soft plump belly. She winks at you. "Now let's take you into the lounge area and introduce you to some of the ladies."

Your heart skips a beat. It is all very well fantasizing about being shrunk and eaten but it is actually quite unnerving to be stared at as if you are nothing but food.

"Hey Ladies!" Melanie calls. "I'd like to introduce you to my 'Dish of the Day!"

There are four women nearby, all of whom look interested. Who would you like to be introduced to first?
12.title: A male 'volunteer'. You've always d...

choices: Mrs Ellis is winning you over. You want to talk to her a little more.
You call for Melanie to introduce you to another hungry lady.
You call for Melanie to tell her that you've changed your mind and want to leave
122.content:
Nervously, you gesture towards the huge elderly lady with the kindly face.

"Hello Madam!" you say.

"Why, hello there my little lamb! How delightful to meet you!" the huge elderly woman smiled as she spoke, her eyes twinkling with kindness. "Don't look so worried, I promise I'll look after you!"

The other ladies look disappointed whilst Melanie leads you both to a small room where you will be able to talk without interruption.

"No longer than five minutes for the 'interview'." Melanie explains. "After that, if you want to spend any more time with Mrs Ellis here, you'll have to agree to be her dinner date, if you know what I mean." Melanie chuckles and leaves the two of you alone.

Mrs Ellis smiles comfortingly. "I must say, you do look rather nervous, dearie!"

You nod. "I'm sorry. It's just that..."

"No need to apologise, little lamb. It must feel very strange to know that you're going to be eaten alive!"

"I've always dreamed of being shrunk and eaten alive, but now I'm actually here... I think I might have made a mistake."

"Oh, you poor little lamb! You are in a pickle, aren't you? I can see you're scared and I want you to know that it's going to be alright."

"Really?" you say, looking hopefully at Mrs Ellis's kindly face.

"Yes, dearie. There's no need to be scared. I'll look after you!" she licks her lips and pats her belly.
122.title: Meet Mrs Ellis

choices: “What do you think it’ll be like for me inside your tummy?”
“Could I see inside your mouth please?”
“How many people have you eaten?”
1221.content:
"There's no need to be scared. I'll look after you!" Mrs Ellis licks her lips and pats her belly. “I’ve always been loving and affectionate to little sweetmeats like you. After all, it’s the least I can do for you before I gobble you up!”

"Thank you." you say to the old lady. "You seem really lovely."

"Oh, that's so very sweet of you my dear! I can see that you’re still scared, though. Would it help you to relax if I let you see my big soft tummy? "

“Yes please!” you reply. “That would be wonderful!”

Mrs Ellis lifts up her dress to reveal a vast expanse of milk soft flesh hang down below the level of her crotch. It hangs low enough to completely conceal the folds of her vagina, this preserving the old lady’s modesty.. You find yourself spellbound at the sight of the kindly old woman’s huge belly, in awe at the vast amount of food she must have eaten over the many years of her life.

“You can touch it if you like!” Mrs Ellis offers. “I don’t mind.”

“Are you sure?” you ask, your voice trembling with excitement.

“Of course, my little lamb! I want you to feel completely at home. After all, my tummy is home to all my food!”.

Tentatively, you reach out your hands and caress Mrs Ellis’s belly, marvelling at how soft and warm her skin feels to the touch. You press gently, your fingers sinking into her squishy rolls. You had never imagined that a tummy could feel so soft and welcoming.

“Well dearie, what do you think?” Mrs Ellis asks.

“I’ve never felt anything so soft in my life!”

“Just think how cosy you’ll feel, snuggled up inside!”

“I… I guess so.” you say. “Please can I ask you a question?”

“Of course, my little lamb chop. Anything you like! What would you like to know?”
1221.title: Mrs Ellis is winning you over. You want to talk...

choices: You've made up your mind. Agree to let Mrs Ellis eat you.
Call for Melanie to introduce you to another lady.
Call for Melanie and tell her you’ve changed your mind.
12211.content:
“Of course, my little lamb chop. Anything you like! What would you like to know?” Mrs Ellis says, a kindly smile on her face.

“What do you think it’ll be like for me inside your tummy?”

“Oh, it’s ever so cosy in here.” she says, patting her belly. “You’ll feel my lovely softness all around you. Mind you, it’s pretty hot in here as well and, if I’m honest, it’s not going to smell too sweet, I’m afraid.

“I’m scared of getting digested.” you admit. “I guess I hadn’t really thought about that part when I signed the contract.”

“I understand, sweetie. It’s all an exciting fantasy until it’s real, isn’t it?”

You nod. “I guess I just like the idea of getting swallowed alive. I don’t really want to be digested.”

“Of course you don’t. There’s no point pretending. The truth is that it really isn’t going to be very nice for you once you’re inside my stomach. Digestion get’s pretty nasty, I’m afraid, so you might as well prepare yourself.”

“You seem like such a kind old lady. How could you want to do that to me?”

Mrs Ellis chuckled. “Oh you must be so confused, you poor thing! I love eating foolish little men like you and I especially love the feeling of having a tiny man trapped inside my big belly! It feels so good when they're wriggling inside me, trying to get out. Poor little dears! There's only one way out and it isn't exactly glamorous! Digestion may not be much fun for you, my little lambkin, but I shall love every moment of it!”

Your heart is racing now and you are feeling increasingly panicky. “Please, Mrs Ellis…” you beg. “I’ve changed my mind. I don't want to be eaten!”

The elderly lady laughed. “It’s too late to back out now, my dear! You need to face facts. From the moment you signed that contract, you gave up all your rights as a human being and became food.You ARE going to get eaten tonight but whilst some of the other ladies here like to torment their little victims, at least you know that I’ll treat you well right up until the moment I swallow you!”
12211.title: “What will it be like for me inside your tummy?"

choices: Jennifer, the bodybuuilder.
Cute redhead Hazel.
Suzanne, the mountainous woman who lives to eat.
122112.content:
The thought of being eaten by Mrs Ellis terrifies you so you decide to try your luck with another diner. There are several greedy women you can choose from:

Jennifer: 198lbs. Jennifer stands out from the rest as she is a professional bodybuilder, toned and ripped. She is 37, blonde haired and tough as nails. Jennifer supplements her rigorous diet with men.

Hazel: 392lbs. A cute and cuddly redhead in her early twenties with twinkling green eyes and a cheeky smile. Hazel seems sweet and lovely in temperament. She waves at you and winks.

Suzanne: 798bs. A mountain of a woman in her early forties. She has long brown hair and with the largest belly you have ever seen. She's watching you intently and looks ravenously hungry.
122112.title: Call for Melanie to introduce you to another lady.

choices: It's dinner time! "I'll be joining Mrs Ellis for dinner, please."
"I'd like to meet another lady please."
12212.content:
“Please can I ask you a question?” you say.

“Of course, my little lamb chop. Anything you like! What would you like to know?” Mrs Ellis smiles sweetly at you, looking for all the world like a kindly grandma.

“I’m a bit shy….” you falter.

“Oh don’t be so silly!” Mrs Ellis chuckles. “I want to gobble you up for dinner. The least I can do for you is to answer your questions. You won’t offend me, you know, so go on and ask me whatever’s on your mind.”

“Could I… ermmm… Could I see inside your mouth please?”

Mrs Ellis laughs. “Is that all? It’s perfectly natural to want to see where you’ll be going, eh? Well then, my scrumptious little morsel, why don’t you come a little closer and take a good look inside Granny’s mouth! And, in case you’re wondering, I still have ALL my own teeth!”

With that, Mrs Ellis opens her mouth wide. You lean in close, the stale smell of her breath wafting over you, and you peer nervously into the moist pink interior of her hungry mouth.

Mrs Ellis’s breath takes you by surprise, fetid with the scent of previously eaten meals and yet faintly cloying and sweet at the same time. Although initially taken aback at your first scent of the hungry old lady’s breath, you are surprised to find the smell strangely comforting as you get used to it.

You find yourself captivated by the sight of Mrs Ellis’s gaping maw, marvelling at the sight of her strong teeth and bewitched by the soft pink interior. You’ve always had a thing about women's mouths but you’ve never been so close to any woman’s mouth before as you are now. Even more thrilling is the knowledge that Mrs Ellis genuinely wants to eat you alive. She stretches her tongue out and leans forward, licking you gently across the cheek. She licks you again and again, coating your face liberally in her slimy wet saliva. The sensation is incredible as her velvet soft tongue caresses your skin and you realise that you would do anything to feel her tongue slide lovingly over every inch of your body.

Mrs Ellis sighs delightedly and then fixes you with her kindly gaze. “My dear little lamb chop…” she says, licking her lips to mop up a glistening string of drool. “You are quite the most delicious morsel! Would you be a love and consent to being my dinner?”

Before you can answer, Melanie returns. “Sorry to interrupt…” she says “...but your five minutes are up, I’m afraid, Mrs Ellis.” The hefty waitress looks at you and says “Time to make up your mind! Will you be joining Mrs Ellis for dinner or would you like me to introduce you to another lady?”
12212.title: “Could I see inside your mouth please?”

choices: Mrs Ellis gobbles you up before she eats her chicken

Melanie takes you to the Shrink booth and pressed the button to shrink you before she out you on a plate with barbecue chicken and fries.
122121.title: It's dinner time! "I'll be joining ...

1221212.content: Mrs Ellis eats her meal and all the while she teases you by licking her lips at you whenever she took a bite of her food. You saw the bulges everytime she swallowed and you could hardly wait to be one of them. Eventually she finished her meal and looked at you with a hungry smile on her face and told you that it finally time for you to fill her belly. She reached for you and brought you to her soft lips and licks your entire body before slurping you into her mouth and rolling you around on her tongue before she eventually decided to gulp you down. You struggled all the way down her throat and enter her belly with a splash. As she had eaten a meal before you her belly was already in the process of digestion and you are instantly coated in burning stomach acids. After a couple of hours you are digested into nothing but mush.
1221212.title: Mrs Ellis eats you for dessert

choices: Raven: A big-bellied goth beauty with black hair, pale skin, and blood-red lips.
Jess: A flame haired beauty with a wicked smile and a lovely soft belly
Kiki: A plump Japanese girl in her late teens or early twenties
Ebony: 600+ lb sexy black eating machine in her twenties
Candice: 18 year old blonde birthday girl
1222.content:
You are beginning to feel even more uncomfortable with this situation. You had hoped that the kindly looking old lady would help put you at ease, but the way she just licked her lips and patted her belly really disturbed you.

You are more convinced than ever that coming to this restaurant and signing up to be eaten was a mistake. Fantasies are fun in your head, but the reality of ending up inside Mrs Ellis’s big belly is filling you with fear. Not knowing what else to do, you make your apologies to Mrs Ellis and call for Melanie.

As the waitress collects you from the private booth and leads you back out into the main restaurant, she smiles at you.

“You didn’t spend long with Mrs Ellis. Is everything alright?”

“I suppose the reality of the situation is just hitting home.” you explain. “I’m not sure I’m ready to be eaten just yet.”

“I am sorry, sir.” Melanie says. “But that’s just too bad for you. After all, you have signed a legally binding consent form. I do need to remind you that you have surrendered all rights and are now legally classified as food.”

“I know. I guess it’s just a lot to take in, that’s all..” you reply.

“There’s no rush, sweetie pie. Remember, if you don’t want to be eaten by any of our guests then it’ll be me eating you at the end of the evening.” She leans in close and whispers in your ear “...nom nom nom!” and then dissolved into a fit of giggles.

Assessing your (admittedly limited) options, you come to the conclusion that you have nothing to lose from talking to other potentially interested hungry ladies. You spot three of the ladies that you briefly met earlier; Raven, the big-bellied Goth beauty, Jess (the soft-bellied redhead with the wicked smile) and Kiki (the plump Japanese girl). They’ve also been joined by two other hungry-looking ladies. There’s Ebony, a truly enormous black goddess in her early 20s (this lady doesn’t mess about - she’ll gobble up any man). Finally, there’s Candice, a cute and playful chubby 18 year old blonde beauty (it’s her 18th birthday and she’s never eaten a man before)..Who are you going to choose?
1222.title: Meeting more hungry ladies

choices: Sweet Kiki has won you over. You agree to let her eat you.
You have more questions for Kiki.
You call for Melanie to introduce you to another woman.
124.content:
The plump Japanese girl catches your eye. She looks sweet and innocent with the softest looking belly that you have ever seen in your life.

"I'd like to be introduced to this young lady, please!" you say.

The Japanese girl looks delighted and giggles as Melanie leads you both to a small room where you can chat in private.

"No longer than five minutes for the 'interview'." Melanie explains. "After that, if you want to spend any more time with Kiki here, you'll have to agree to be her dinner date, if you know what I mean." Melanie chuckles and leaves the two of you alone.

Kiki giggles shyly.

"Thank you for picking me!" she says. "I always feel so shy when I meet delicious looking men, like you."

"That's very sweet." you reply. "If it helps, I'm feeling pretty nervous myself. It's kind of scary to think that I might actually end up inside your tummy."

"Oh, don't be scared!" Kiki said, her tone reassuring. "I think you would like it inside my tummy."

"Have you eaten a lot of men?" you ask.

Kiki grins and nods. "Men like you are my favourite food! I eat two or three every week!"

"So, why are you shy?" you ask.

"I guess it is because I want to eat you so much! I just hope that you will agree to be my dinner. I promise I'll treat you very well!"
124.title: Kiki: A plump Japanese girl

14.title: A first time customer with an appetite

info.brief_description: An interactive story where men are food for greedy woman with big appetites.
info.description:
“Tinies” is the new restaurant in town for the true food lover. Their specialty is serving big women with even BIGGER appetites the ultimate in luxury treats, tiny shrunken men. Men are picked, secretly and at random, whilst a select few volunteer for the 'honour' of being swallowed whole by a beautiful BBW. The men are offered for sale to the hungry female diners at the restaurant. As a ‘last request’, the men are allowed to choose which woman will get to eat them. Each woman is allowed to spend 5 minutes with the tiny man when she may attempt to convince him to accept her offer of a ‘dinner date’. He is then shrunk in a special booth and served up to the lucky woman with the rest of the meal she has ordered. The man is placed on her table in a little glass (to prevent him from escaping), whilst the woman’s meal is served.

Men are entitled to refuse, but if they don't agree to a 'dinner date' by the end of the evening then they lose that right and are eaten by one of the waitresses.

In this story, you choose to play the part of a male 'meal' or a female 'diner'.
